title: Programming Practical Skills Enhancement: Differentiated Instruction (DI)-Based Language Education Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language instruction experience in elementary education settings and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language activities tailored to their proficiency level using DI (Differentiated Instruction) strategies in a VR simulation environment
Learners can improve simulation lesson materials by 80% or more based on formative assessment feedback
Learners can utilize five or more differentiated digital learning resources (text/audio/video) in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
